optimization_record.recommendation_description: The following recommendations are the standard design flow for creating DDR3 SDRAM Memory Interfaces and also provide some specific examples.

To create a DDR3 SDRAM Memory Interface on an Altera device, use the DDR3 SDRAM High Performance Controller which automatically instantiates the ALTMEMPHY megafunction. Please refer to the DDR3 SDRAM High Performance Controller User Guide for more information.
optimization_record.description: Altera's DDR3 SDRAM High Performance Controller megafunction allows the rapid creation of a DDR3 SDRAM physical layer interface (PHY) in Arria II GX, Stratix III, and Stratix IV devices. The PHY safely transfers data between memory and user logic. The PHY created by the DDR3 SDRAM High Performance Controller can be configured easily with the MegaWizard Plug-In Manager.

action.action_description: Refer to the DDR3 SDRAM High Performance Controller User Guide for more information. You can also use the Support section on the Altera web site or the Quartus II Help to obtain more information on the specific recommendations for settings and assignments with the Quartus II Software.
